EmailTemplate.name: PAS 2017 _SIW.201704_EMEAI_Event_ParisAirShow_Invite4_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Reserve Your Seat Today! Honeywell Brunch - Paris Air Show 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Paris Air Show is only two weeks away. To kick off your Paris Air Show experience, the Honeywell Aerospace Event Team would like to invite you to an exquisite brunch at a world-famous restaurant in the heart of the Bois de Boulogne. Senior leaders from Honeywell Aerospace look forward to connecting with you at this stunning venue.
Date: June 18, 2017 Time: 11am – 2pm Location: Le Pré Catelan – Salons Bois de Boulogne Route de la Grande, Cascade 75000 Paris
Please click here to RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017ParisAirShow_BrunchInvite.html]]>. Limited seats are available!
Kindly RSVP by June 9, 2017. Contact us at aero.marketing@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aero.marketing@honeywell.com]]> with any questions.
Read about Honeywell Aerospace activities for Paris Air Show 2017 and more by visiting aerospace.honeywell.com <[[aerospace.honeywell.com]]>.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
